hiveArticle.title: Color Challenge - Tuesday Orange - Sunset
hiveArticle.body:
My today's entry for color-challenge is a orange sky at the time of sunset. I have tried to capture with two angles one taking half sky and half trees whereas other taking 75% of sky.

![IMG_20171219_174434.jpg](https://steemitimages.com/DQmRguBa3bxKbSwrvrL3fgdnTZqYsrL18icRVTpwGqFbGuJ/IMG_20171219_174434.jpg)

![IMG_20171219_174441.jpg](https://steemitimages.com/DQmUPXLf8bJJp9D2rbFvrJ7LiWxNorCu3Vag6DY8UKAXCwV/IMG_20171219_174441.jpg)

Camera : Nokia 6
